Author: SVET5#3137
Content: In simple term, does nSPV works like winrar by compressing the blockchain into smaller chunks?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: not at all

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it allows proving transactions exist in the blockchain with minimal data

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and when the nSPV wallet is done, it is something that can be used by any smartchain

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: which makes smartchains that much more attractive to have

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content:
@DugiOtok there was no security issues with the website. I was going to use that claim fee to help fund more development for Komodo but then people were using their ledger privatekeys just to get around the fee. After the Agama issues, i thought it would be best to just let everyone use it for free. Best someone uses it than the development costs go to waste.

If anyone is appreciative of the website, please send tips to the James refund address to help him out.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: No there were none that i can remember @DugiOtok
